question: There have been 8 vice presidents who filled out the remaining term of the president under which they served. For a point each, name them
answer: John Tyler (Harrison), Millard Fillmore (Taylor), Andrew Johnson (Lincoln), Chester Arthur (Garfield), Theodore Roosevelt (McKinley), Calvin Coolidge (Harding), Harry S. Truman (Roosevelt), Lyndon B. Johnson (Kennedy), Gerald Ford (Nixon)
